dmca.title: POW! Cartoons DMCA Take Down Notice [Blogger]
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]:

Enclosed are twelve letters with accompanying screen shots of unauthorized use on your server of copyright material by [Private] and [Private], our clients.

Each letter addressees a specific URL using our clients material. The URL's that apply to the enclosed letters are:

http://cathiefromcanada.blogspot.com/2005_12_01_cathiefromcanada_archive.html
http://thedailypulse.blogspot.com/2005_10_01_archive.html
http://scribeoke.blogspot.com/2005/12/cartoon-conscience-alls-fair.html
http://pekkajnykanen.blogspot.com/2005_07_01_pekkajnykanen_archive.html
http://scribeoke.blogspot.com/2005_10_01_scribeoke_archive.html
http://noseconenews.blogspot.com/2006_07_01_archive.html
http://grandelojadoqueijolimiano.blogspot.com/2004_08_15_grandelojadoqueijolimiano_archive.html
http://smallestminority.blogspot.com/2003_06_08_smallestminority_archive.html
http://indybuzz.blogspot.com/2005_10_01_archive.html
http://einkleinesblog.blogspot.com/2006_08_01_einkleinesblog_archive.html
http://sumomerriment.blogspot.com/2006/06/us-troops-kill-pregnant-woman-in-iraq.html
http://ny13.blogspot.com/2006_10_01_archive.html



Truly,
[Private]
Sales Manager

------

Dear [Private]:

We are writing on behalf of our client, [Private], who is the copyright owner of the exclusive rights in the copyrighted work, identified in the attachment below, regarding the unauthorized use of such image on your server, located at http://ny13.blogspot.com/2006_10_01_archive.html. We were unable to find an e-mail address or any contact information for the person(s) who create and maintain this website.

We have a good faith belief that this use of our client's work is not authorized by our client, our client's agents or the law.

Demand is therefore made that you cease and desist from any infringing uses, and provide us within ten (10) days from the date of this letter written confirmation that all such infringements of our client's work have been removed from this location on your server.

The information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, we are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights in the work that are being infringed.

This letter is written without prejudice to all the rights and remedies that are available to our client, at law or in equity, all being hereby reserved.

Very truly yours,

[Private]
Sales Manager

----
